attributes.additional_details:
With his bite on the Italian football player Giorgio Chiellini, Luis Suarez has demonstrated that he repeated is guilty of violent conduct with no intention or will to change.

Such violent conduct in the street would not be accepted, let alone with an audience of millions. Anyone else guilty of such a crime would have their visa revoked and face deportation.

This visa is to push make the Home Office look at his conduct, his violent behaviour and revoke his visa.
